Directions:

From Campton:
Enter Jackson via HWY 15 by turning left at the stop light.
Turn right at the intersection by Walgreens.
At the next light, turn left, passing Variety Pizza.
Then go about half a mile and we will be on the right!
From Hazard:
Enter Jackson via HWY 15.
After passing Jiffy Mart and Citizens Bank, take a left at the stop light.
Drive for about a quarter of a mile and we are on the left!

Meet Renee!

Renee Roberts is the wife of Lloyd "Jean" Roberts, Jr. She is a very caring woman who has a great sense of taste. She originally ran the store, Repeat Boutique, which burned down this past year. However, she healed her home and they were able to recover. Now, she runs Petals, Flowers, and Home. She puts all of her time and dedication into her family and small business. Her son, Lloyd, and his wife, Ladonna, run Studio 6 Salon, which is right next door to the flower shop.  

Meet Tracy & Becky!

  • Tracy, a retired cosmotologist, is Renee's sister. The pair are known to scheme up some great flower designs. Tracy is a resident of Campton, KY, and loves spending time with her family.
  • Becky, a close friend of the family, is a do-it-all woman! She is great with designs and communication. Go on down and see Becky, you'll leave with something you never knew you needed! Every now and then, you can catch Turner's Produce set up outside at Petals!
